# Mirage Arcana (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** One 20-ft. cube/level (S)

**Duration:** Concentration +1 hour/ level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 314

This spell functions like *[[Hallucinatory Terrain (Spell)|hallucinatory terrain]]*, except that it enables you to make any area appear to be something other than it is. The illusion includes audible, visual, tactile, and olfactory elements. Unlike *[[Hallucinatory Terrain (Spell)|hallucinatory terrain]]**,* the spell can alter the appearance of structures (or add them where none are present). Still, it canâ€™t disguise, conceal, or add creatures (though creatures within the area might hide themselves within the illusion just as they can hide themselves within a real location).
